author: Kolkata Bureau
text:
Book lovers visiting the upcoming International Kolkata Book Fair can catch a glimpse of the 39-year-long journey of the fair this year. At the 40th edition of the book fair, installations depicting its “historic achievements” will be set up.

“The heritage walk will be held at the fair ground and is aimed at drawing the youth to the fair,” Sudhangshu Dey, Director of Publishers & Booksellers Guild, said here on Monday.

He said installations depicting the founding of the guild at the Coffee House of Kolkata would be on display.

Based on feedback from visitors, several variations of the heritage walk may be brought in the future, organisers said. A mobile app is available for visitors to locate stalls easily. About 600 stalls are being set up.
title: Kolkata Book Fair to celebrate heritage
